WorkItem.Description:
Neither view (urls below) of a specific dinner displays the iCal link when in my iPhone's Safari browser, as FF3 does on my PC (with the top link - can't get to the bottom link on my PC).

http://nerddinner.com/1181
http://nerddinner.com/#_Details

Since my iPhone is the only place I keep my calendar (I don't sync calendar w/Outlook/iTunes), this is quite annoying as I will have to manually enter the event.
WorkItem.Summary: iCal link does not appear on dinner page on iPhone/Safari
